alert.note: Alert for Jones (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 14 at 3:27PM CDT until July 14 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BUCHANAN...NORTHWESTERN JONES...SOUTHWESTERN DELAWARE AND NORTHEASTERN LINN COUNTIES... At 327 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Robinson, or 11 miles southwest of Manchester, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Central City, Coggon, Delhi, Ryan, Prairieburg, Delaware, Troy Mills, Paris, Robinson, Buffalo Creek Park, Monti, Pinicon Ridge Park, Buck Creek, Baileys Ford Park and Turtle Creek Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
